attributes.action: allow employers to offer salary sacrifice schemes to pay for the exorbitant prices that rail companies charge for annual season tickets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any income that is sacrificed ceases to be salary and so is not subject to either income tax or National Insurance charges. 

At present, the only options for salary sacrifice are;
* Childcare vouchers
* Workplace parking 
* Cyle to work schemes

In the current economic climate, it is unlikely that many commuters will be awarded a pay rise that covers the totally unfair and unrealistic fare increases that rail companies insist on levying so I propose that season ticket loans offered by employers can be paid for via salary sacrifice. 

With fares increasing year on year, it will not be long before it becomes to expensive and commuters have no option but to give up on public transport altogether and revert back to driving to work. This would not only be disastrous to the environment but cause chaos on motorways and in city centres.
